free_text.Remarque: Cours théorique de 4 après-midis sur  une semaine et de 1 journée en laboratoire durant le semestre pour la partie pratique.
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Cours ex cathedra, exercices et visite de labo
free_text.Contenu: [li] Introduction to arguments and to methods of in vivo studies[br/][li] Biology of laboratory mice and rats. Introduction to genetic engineering and experimental models[br/][li] Logistics, housing and care of animals. Husbandry, breeding and confinement with an emphasis on the EPFL [br/][li] Design of experiments, scientific and technical issues, ethical considerations and legal requirements[br/][li] Examples of research models used at the EPFL[br/]
free_text.Forme du contrôle: Examen écrit à la fin du module, en semestre.
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: General principles of animal experimentation with emphasis on rodent models in the context of the EPFL.
